changes.text: Removed code duplication and dead code across extension modules
Removed unnecessary web-accessible resource exposure
Favicons now sourced locally for improved privacy
Redesigned settings header with unified navigation bar
Code refactoring with shared utility functions for better maintainability
Added missing translation keys across all 14 supported languages
Unified clipboard functionality with consistent behavior
Fixed duplicate code patterns in popup and settings pages
Advanced Analytics tab with detailed server insights and performance metrics
Top performing links analysis with click statistics
Analytics data export functionality for external analysis
Enhanced API integration with multiple endpoint support
Analytics data caching for improved performance
Complete UI modernization with new design system
Interactive dashboard with server statistics and recent links
Added support for 6 new languages: Greek, Italian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Swedish
Enhanced accessibility with keyboard navigation and screen reader support
Improved internationalization with 14+ languages and RTL support
Fixed CORS issues with background script API requests
Added Arabic language support with RTL layout
Added Simplified Chinese localization
Version information display in footer
Enhanced YOURLS server configuration options
Language ordering improvements and style adjustments
Initial release with Manifest V3 support
Basic URL shortening functionality
Multi-server support for switching between YOURLS instances
One-click copy functionality for shortened URLs
Context menu integration for link shortening
Configuration settings for YOURLS server and preferences
